Missoula is governed via the [[mayor-council]] system. There are twelve members of the [[city council]] who are elected from one of six wards. Each ward elects two council members. The mayor is elected in a citywide vote.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ci.missoula.mt.us/DocumentView.aspx?DID=461 |title=City of Missoula Charter |publisher=ci.missoula.met.us |accessdate=27 November 2010}}</ref>
Missoula is governed via the [[mayor-council]] system. There are twelve members of the [[city council]] who are elected from one of six wards. Each ward elects two council members. The mayor is elected in a citywide vote.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.ci.missoula.mt.us/DocumentView.aspx?DID=461 |title=City of Missoula Charter |publisher=ci.missoula.met.us |accessdate=27 November 2010}}</ref>
Missoula is known as a more [[Modern liberalism in the United States|liberal]] area than the rest of the state, having 14 [[Democratic Party (United States)|Democrats]] and one [[Republican Party (United States)|Republican]] in its state legislative delegation.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.missoulian.com/articles/2007/12/23/news/local/news02.txt |title=Missoula reputation tough to overcome for local candidates. |publisher=Missoulian |date=2007-12-23 |accessdate=2009-02-09}}</ref> Missoula's Mayor has been John Engen since 2006 and is currently the 50th mayor of Missoula, MT<ref>[[John Engen]]</ref>
Missoula is known as a more [[Modern liberalism in the United States|liberal]] area than the rest of the state, having 14 [[Democratic Party (United States)|Democrats]] and one [[Republican Party (United States)|Republican]] in its state legislative delegation.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.missoulian.com/articles/2007/12/23/news/local/news02.txt |title=Missoula reputation tough to overcome for local candidates. |publisher=Missoulian |date=2007-12-23 |accessdate=2009-02-09}}</ref> Missoula's Mayor has been John Engen since 2006 and is currently the 50th mayor of Missoula, MT<ref>[[John Engen]]</ref>

[[Image:Mayor-John-Engen.jpg|thumb|Missoula's mayor John Engen since 2006-Missoula's 50th mayor]]
 
Currently the City of Missoula is undergoing a rewrite of the zoning and subdivision regulations, is undertaking a study of the Urban Fringe Development Area (UFDA), is working in partnership on the Downtown Master Plan, and is finalizing a long-range transportation plan.
Currently the City of Missoula is undergoing a rewrite of the zoning and subdivision regulations, is undertaking a study of the Urban Fringe Development Area (UFDA), is working in partnership on the Downtown Master Plan, and is finalizing a long-range transportation plan.
